item.title: MAGA Is Already Rewriting the ICE Shooting in Minneapolis
item.description: The federal government’s narrative of the Minneapolis shooting conflicts wildly with video footage of the incident shared online.

item.title: AI Devices Are Coming. Will Your Favorite Apps Be Along for the Ride?
item.description: Tech companies are calling AI the next platform. But some developers are reluctant to let AI agents stand between them and their users.
